data.eml:eml: Somatochlora shennong sp. nov. from Hubei, China (Odonata: Corduliidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Hao-Miao, Vogt, Timothy E., Cai, Qing-Hua (2014): Somatochlora shennong sp. nov. from Hubei, China (Odonata: Corduliidae). Zootaxa 3878 (5): 479-484, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3878.5.6
